mapper.select: /* ManagerDAO.hakwonManagerInfo */ select c.user_no , c.user_id , c.user_name , c.tel1_no , b.manager_no , c.photo_file_no , get_file_path(c.photo_file_no) as photo_file_path from tb_hakwon a , tb_manager b , tb_user_info c where a.hakwon_no = #{hakwonNo} and a.manager_no = b.manager_no and b.user_no = c.user_no

/* ManagerDAO.managerSearch */ select a.manager_no , b.user_no , b.user_id , b.user_name , b.tel1_no , get_file_path(b.photo_file_no) as photo_file_path from tb_manager a , tb_user_info b where a.user_no = b.user_no and (a.manager_no = #{searchText} or b.user_name like concat('%', #{searchText}, '%') ) order by b.user_name asc
